ygData.subject: Re: Equipment?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Earrings are gold Jasper, and rings are Platinum Jasper ... lol, i ve had mine forever too... it s the first +wis item I owned ... Oh what I wouldn t do
ygData.messageBody:
>+3 wis earring (2) (can't remember what they are called)
>+6 wis ring (2) (ditto)


Earrings are gold Jasper, and rings are Platinum Jasper

>BI Medallion +3 wis/int (have had this forever it seems)


lol, i've had mine forever too... it's the first +wis item I owned


>Mirthil Bracer (2) 4ac +3st +5wis


Oh what I wouldn't do for these... but alas, i'm only level 29... give it
time...

>Adamentium Epaulets (sp?) 9ac +7wis


Wow! Where do these come from? I will assume they are out of my range for
a while yet, but it's nice to dream...

>Ethernal Mist Leggings 14ac +5st/agi +9wis +dis/pois (was gator legs)

>Girdle of the Diligent 10ac +5wis/sta (was belt of the river)


Wow.. these are more items I can only dream of.. is this PoF stuff??

> As an example this past weekend at the bazaar someone was selling a
>nightshade wreath (1ac +5wis/int) and the opening bid was 2k plat (not like
I
>even have that much). Now compare this to the runed circlet which I paid
400
>plat for and tell me if it's worth another 1600 plat.


LOL... 2000 plat eh? How much did it end up selling for? The runed
circlet is definately a better value.. and actually you can get that very
easily (even at my level) if you are willing to wait for that slow spawning
goblin preacher...

I wasn't planning on going for the cleric armor... but then I looked closer
and realized it actually is a little better than rubicite (except for the
obvious Rubi breastplate which had that nice healing aura on it)... and I
saw a cleric wearing most of the cleric armor the other day and it looked
really nice on him. So I may try to get some of that, though I don't know
that I want to replace my bloodstained tunic which has +wisdom on it....

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
